Waller County Hazard Mitigation Plan

DID YOU KNOW - Healthcare
11/02/2023
**![clinic](https://www.brookshiretx.gov/upload/page/0060/images/258s.jpg)**
Orthopedic surgery, cardiology, and general family practice are just a few of the specializations offered by the several hospitals and clinics in the area. Local therapists and counselors provide high-quality mental health services to Brookshire residents. Preventive health care, such as immunizations and screenings for early disease identification, can benefit the community. With these services at their fingertips, Brookshire offers its residents an excellent setting for maintaining their general health and well-being. Oh, and did we mention Brookshire is less than an hour away from the greatest medical center in the world.
DID YOU KNOW - Cost of Living
11/02/2023
**![sign](https://www.brookshiretx.gov/upload/page/0060/images/Brookshire_CIMG7180.JPG)**
Compared to other regions of the nation, Brookshire has a low cost of living; the monthly rent for a two-bedroom apartment is just $1,150, while the national average is $1,430. Furthermore, Brookshire's Grocery Cost Index is 99, whereas the US index is 100. This proves that grocery prices are less expensive here than they are in most other parts of America. All things considered, Brookshire offers its residents a reasonably priced and secure area to live.
DID YOU KNOW - Top Notch Schools
11/02/2023
**![high school](https://www.brookshiretx.gov/upload/page/0060/images/20230506-234517-Royal%20High%20School.jpg)**
Some of the top schools in the region are located in Brookshire, Texas. The neighborhood schools in Brookshire are well regarded and provide a wide range of learning possibilities. Pupils can choose from a wide range of courses that fulfill their specific requirements and offer them a top-notch education. Furthermore, educators and administrators are committed to establishing a secure learning environment for each and every student. These educational institutions prioritize academic accomplishment and aim to equip students with the necessary skills for success in postsecondary education. Additionally, Brookshire's school ratings are outstanding, demonstrating the dedication of its faculty to providing their kids with the best education possible.
